name: Nut Hates Wall
description:
This is the First Game I have made on Unity.

Nut Hates Wall-

Some Stupid Nuts are Trying to get through Your WALL, Stop them!

Red Eyed Nuts are stupid Nuts and Green Eyed ones are Friends. Don't attack your Friends, this will reduce your Cash Score and Health. Attack the Stupid ones by clicking on them and protect your wall!

For every Stupid Nut you attack, You get Cash, used to buy and upgrade Turrets, which help you in attacking more Stupid nuts.

Score as much points as you can!
